titleStmt.funder: The cataloguing of this item was made possible through a benefaction from the late John P. Clay, founder and benefactor of the Clay Sanskrit Library.

msDesc.head: A paper manuscript consisting of seventeen separately foliated texts from the Mahābhārata, the Pañcaratna, as well as various stotras and kavacas. Illustrated with twelve miniatures and floral borders.

supportDesc.foliation: Arabic numerals in pencil, top-left corner, verso.

condition.p: Folios in good condition. Binding worn through in multiple places, with a hole in the fabric of the flap.

layout.p: 6 lines per page, approximately 20 akṣara s per line.

p.note: Framed with a ruled border in black, red, and orange pigment. Initial page of each manuscript part is framed with an ornate border with gold floral motifs on black, red, blue, and beige background.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black and red ink. Initial pages of each part include Devanāgarī in gold ink.

desc.q: likhitaṃ kaśmīramadhye hāthapaṃḍita bhābhūrāmakī paṭhanārthī vaiṣṇavakausalyā-dāsavidyārthī śubham |

p.desc: The scribe might be identical to the the scribe of MS. Mill 111.

handNote.desc: The inbound paper note contains a manuscript note in black ink in modern hand, most likely of the cataloguer Theodor Aufrecht, listing the foliation of the manuscript.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title on top-left margin, verso.

binding.p: Possibly a contemporary binding in South Asian red and yellow striped cloth over pasteboard, with a triangular flap. A brown leather compartment with the title tooled in gold inset on the spine. Shelfmark number painted in white pigment on the spine. Cardboard cover box.
Binding in a deteriorating condition, with many loose threads and holes on the flap.

history.origin:
saṃvat 1879 / 1823 CE
F. 559r: oṃ saṃvat 1879 bhāśruti tṛtīyasyāṃ ravau |
Keith dates the text to saṃvat 1873 / 1817 CE, but suggests that "3 is doubtful" .
history.acquisition: The collections of William Hodge Mill were purchased by the Bodleian Library in 1849 and 1858 .

recordHist.source:
Description by Barbora Sojkova, based on observation of the manuscript and the following sources:
Keith,Appendix to Vol. I,no. 22, p. 3;no. 28, p. 4;no. 26, p. 4;no. 33, p. 5;no. 35, p. 5;no. 161, p. 21;no. 731, p. 91;no. 732, p. 91;no. 733, p. 91;no. 152, p. 20;no. 162, p. 21;no. 166, p. 21;no. 146, p. 19;no. 89 , p. 12;no. 153, p. 20;no. 165, p. 21;no. 164, p. 21 Aufrecht,Codices Sanscriticos complectens, vol. 1.no. 22, p. 3;no. 28, p. 4;no. 26, p. 3;no. 33, pp. 4-5;no. 35, p. 5;no. 161, p. 106;no. 731, p. 301;no. 732, pp. 301-302;no. 733, p. 302;no. 152, pp. 98-99;no. 162, pp. 106-107;no. 166, p. 107;no. 146, p. 90;no. 89, p. 37;no. 153, p. 99;no. 165, p. 107;no. 164, p. 107

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions ). Contact specialcollections.enquiries@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript.

listBibl.bibl: Arthur Berriedale Keith,Catalogue of Sanskrit manuscripts in the Bodleian Library: Appendix to Vol. I(Oxford, 1909), no. 22, p. 3; no. 28, p. 4; no. 26, p. 4; no. 33, p. 5; no. 35, p. 5; no. 161, p. 21; no. 731, p. 91; no. 732, p. 91; no. 733, p. 91; no. 152, p. 20; no. 162, p. 21; no. 166, p. 21; no. 146, p. 19; no. 89 , p. 12; no. 153, p. 20; no. 165, p. 21; no. 164, p. 21

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Bhagavadgītā.

msItem.title: Bhagavadgītā
msItem.rubric: F. 1r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ namo bhāgavate vāsudevāya ||
msItem.incipit: F. 1r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ asya śrī bhagavadgītā mālāmaṃtrasya śrī bhagavānvedavāsatrāṣi ||
msItem.colophon: Ff. 148v-149r [ff. 145v-146r in original foliation]: iti śrī bhagavadgītāsūpaniśatsuvramyavi | dhāyāṃ yogaśāstre śrī kṛṣṇārjanasaṃvātemobhya saṃnyāsa yogonāmapraṣṭāṭa śodhmāyaḥ || 18 || samāptoyaṃ śrī bhagavadgītā || saṃsurṇam || śubhaṃ ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. ix: Miniature depicting Kṛṣṇa and Arjuna on a chariot. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 1r: An ornate border with gold floral motifs on black, red, blue, and beige background.
F. 1v: A gold, red, and black border with pink flowers and foliage.
F. 88v: Miniature depicting Kṛṣṇa, showing all his forms to Arjuna. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I , no. 22, p. 3

msItem.title: Viṣṇusahasranāmakathana
msItem.rubric: F. 153r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya ||
msItem.incipit: F. 153r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ yasya smaraṇamātreṇa janmasaṃsārabaṃdhanāt vimucyate namastasmai viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave ||1||
msItem.colophon: F. 188r [f. 35r in original foliation]: iti śrī mahābhārate śatatsahasrāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ vayāsivyāṃ śāṃtiparvaṇi uttamānuśāsane dhānadharmeṣu sturnāmā sahasraṃ saṃsarṇam || śubham ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 151v: Miniature depicting Viṣṇu lying on a serpent surrounded by lotus flowers, with Lakṣmī massaging his feet, and Brahmā sitting on a lotus growing from Viṣṇu's navel. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 153r [f. 1r in original foliation]: An ornate border with gold floral motifs on black, red, blue, and beige background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 28, p. 4

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Bhīṣmastavarāja.

msItem.title: Bhīṣmastavarāja
msItem.rubric: F. 193r [f. 38r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmānujāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 193r [f. 38r in original foliation]: oṁ janmejaya uvāca ||
msItem.colophon: F. 216v [f. 60v in original foliation]: iti śrī mahābhārate śatasahasprāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śāṃtiparvaṇi bhīṣasnavarājaḥ saṃsūrṇam ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 190v: Miniature depicting the four-armed Viṣṇu holding the conch, cakra, lotus, and club, standing in front of Bhīṣma, pierced by many arrows, and Arjuna drawing a bow. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 26, p. 4

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Vaiṣṇavī Anusmṛti.

msItem.title: Vaiṣṇavī Anusmṛti
msItem.rubric: F. 220r [f. 61r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rānakṛṣṇādhyā namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 220r [f. 61r in original foliation]: oṃ śatātīka uvāca ||
msItem.colophon: F. 233v [f. 74v in original foliation]: iti śrī mahābhārate śāṃtiparvaṇi śatasahasrāṁ saṃhitāyāṁ viṣṇudharmotare anusmṛtiḥ samāptā ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 210v: Miniature depicting two royal figures, with the left one holding a mālā. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 220r: An ornate border with gold floral motifs on black, red, blue, and beige background.
F. 220v: A gold, red, and black border with pink flowers and foliage.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 33, p. 5

msItem.title: Gajendramokṣaṇa
msItem.rubric: F. 237r [f. 75r in original foliation]: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsvadevāya ||
msItem.incipit: F. 237r [f. 75r in original foliation]: oṃ śatānika uvāca ||
msItem.colophon: F. 269r [f. 107r in original foliation]: iti śrī sanaktumāra saṃhitāyāṃ nāradoktaṃ śrī rāmacaṃdrasnavarājastotraṃ saṃsarṇam || yad attaraṃ padbhraṣṭaṃ māṃtrāhinaṃ vayadbhavet || tat saṃvrttemyatāṃ devakaśyavaitiścakaṃmātaḥ ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 235v: Miniature depicting Viṣṇu with Garuḍa and white elephant, with a left front leg being eaten by a fish, and holding a lotus flower in the trunk. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 237r [f. 75r in original foliation]: An ornate border with floral motifs in pink and green on blue and gold background.
F. 237v [f. 75v in original foliation]: A gold and red border with pink and gold flowers.

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I , no. 35, p. 5

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Rāmacandrastavarāja.

msItem.title: Rāmacandrastavarāja
msItem.rubric: F. 273r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 273r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ asma śrī rāmacaṃdrastavarājastotramaṃtrasya sanatkumāra ṛṣiranuṣṭup chaṃdaḥ
msItem.colophon: Ff. 293v-294r [f. 21v-22r in original foliation]: iti śrī sanatkumārasaṃhitāyāṃ nāradoktaṃ rāmacaṃdrastavarājastotraṃ saṃpūrṇam || yad taraṃ yadbhuṣṭaṃ māṁtrāhinaṃ vayadbhavet || tat sarvaṃ temyatāṃ devakaśyavaitiścalaṃmānaḥ || gama |

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 235v: Miniature depicting seated Rāma and Sītā, facing Hanumān and being fanned by Lakṣmaṇa. Framed with a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 273r [f. 1r in original foliation]: An ornate border with floral motifs in pink and green on blue and gold background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 161, p. 21

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Rāmagītā.

msItem.title: Rāmagītā
msItem.rubric: F. 296r [f. 1r in original foliation] oṃ śrī materāmānujāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 296r [f. 1r in original foliation] oṁ gaṇeśaṃ kamalānāthaṃ praṇipatya guroḥ padaṃ | kariṣya rāmagītāyāṃ vyākhyānaṃ vālavuddhye || 1 ||
msItem.colophon: F. 315v [f. 20v in original foliation] iti śrī madadhyātmā rāmāyaṇo umāmaheccharasaṃvāde śrīrāmagītāyaṃ vamaḥ sargāḥ ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 296r [f. 1r in original foliation]: An border with floral motifs in green, pink, and gold. Framed in orange, pink, and black lining.

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I, no. 731, p. 91

msItem.note: F. 316 , f. 318, and f. 347 left blank.
msItem.title: Rāmamantrapaṭala
msItem.rubric: F. 319r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 319r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ bhṛthītvāyābhṛatālokādevitvaṁ vilanābhṛtā
msItem.colophon: F. 346v [f. 28v in original foliation] iti śrī rāmamaṃtrayadalaṃsaṃpūrṇa ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 235v: Miniature depicting a yogi seated on tiger skin under a tree. Framed by a golden floral border on blue and red background.
F. 319r [f. 1r in original foliation]: An ornate border with floral motifs in gold and red on blue, red, and gold background.
F. 319v [f. 1v in original foliation]: A gold and red border with pink and gold flowers.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 732, p. 91

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Śrīrāmapaddhati.

msItem.title: Śrīrāmapaddhati
msItem.rubric: F. 348r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrīmaterāmānujāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 348r f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ gururbrahmā gururviṣṇugurudevamaheśavaraḥ |
msItem.colophon: F. 384v [f. 38v in original foliation]: iti śrīmadrāmānujācāryam kṛtaṃ śrīrāmapaddhativedoktaṃ saṃpūrṇam ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 348r [f. 1r in original foliation] An ornate border with floral motifs in gold, pink, and red on blue and gold background.
F. 348v[f. 1v in original foliation]A gold and red border with pink and gold flowers.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 733, p. 91

msItem.title: Rāmasahasranāmastotra
msItem.rubric: F. 388r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmacaṃdrāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 388r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī pārvaty uvāca oṃ devadeva mahādeva bhaktānugrahakāraka || tvataḥ śrutaṁ mayā pūrvaṃ maṃtrāṇāṃ śatakoṭayaḥ || 1
msItem.colophon: F. 427v [f. 40v in original foliation] iti śrī vrahmayāmale sṛṣṭipraśaṃsāyāṃ umāmaheśvarasaṃvāde rakārādiśrīrāmasahasranāmastotraṃ saṁpūrṇam ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 386v: Miniature depicting Śiva and Pārvatī seated on lotuses, accompanied by a lying bull and a tiger. Framed by a golden floral border on blue and red background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I, no. 152, p. 20

msItem.title: Jānakīsahasranāmastotra
msItem.rubric: F. 431r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrīmaterāmakṛṣṇāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 431r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ atha jyānakyā sahasranām līṣate
msItem.colophon: F. 457r [f. 27v in original foliation]: iti śrī siddheśvarataṃtre śrīrāmalanmaṇa saṃvādevājānavyāsahasamastītraṃ saṃpūrṇam ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 429v: Miniature depicting Sītā seated on a throne, accompanied by two female servants. Framed by a floral border on blue and gold background.
F. 431r [f. 1r in original foliation] An ornate border with floral motifs in pink and green on blue and gold background.
F. 431v[f. 1v in original foliation]A border with pink and green floral motifs on gold background.

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I, no. 162, p. 21

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Gāyatrīmantra.

msItem.title: Gāyatrīmantra
msItem.rubric: F. 462r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrīmaterāmakṛṣṇāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 462r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ utiṣṭaṃtu mahābhutā ye bhutā bhumi yālakā ||
msItem.colophon: F. 494r [f. 33r in original foliation]: iti tārāyaṇagāyatrīmaṁtraḥ || || iti śrī coviśagāyatrīsaṃpūrṇam ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 460v: Miniature depicting Brahmā seated on a lotus-flower throne on a haṃsā, accompanied by two male servants. Framed by a gold floral border on blue and red background.
F. 461r [f. 1r in original foliation]: A border with pink and green floral motifs on gold background, framed in orange, gold and black line.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 166, p. 21

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of various Śākta Prayers.

msItem.title: Śākta Prayers
msItem.rubric: F. 496r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 496r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrīkṛṣṇanāradaṃ pratyāha ||
msItem.colophon: F. 522v-523r [f. 27v-28r in original foliation] iti śrī rudrāyāmalecaṭikālagna saṃpūrṇam ||

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 146, p. 19

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Nārāyaṇavarmopadeśa.

msItem.title: Nārāyaṇavarmopadeśa
msItem.rubric: F. 525r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 525r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ aṣṭame viśvarūpastu varmanāyāyaṇātmakaṃ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 534r-v [f. 10r-v in original foliation] iti śrī bhāgavatemahāpūrāṇe ṣeṣṭas kaṃdhenārāyaṇavarmanāmāṣṭamodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 525r [f. 1r in original foliation]: A border with gold abstract motifs without a background, framed in orange, red and black line.

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I, no. 89 , p. 12

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Rāmakavaca.

msItem.title: Rāmakavaca
msItem.rubric: F. 535r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 535r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ asya śrī rāmaṣaḍakṣaramaṃtrarājasya |
msItem.colophon: F.543v [f. 9v in original foliation] iti śrī vrahāyāmale taṃtre umāmaheścarasaṃvāde trailokyamohanaṃ rāmakavacaṃ saṃpūrṇam || rāma ||

listBibl.bibl: Keith,Appendix to Vol. I, no. 153, p. 20

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Lakṣmaṇakavaca.

msItem.title: Lakṣmaṇakavaca
msItem.rubric: F. 545r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī lakṣmaṇāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 545r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ saumitrikavacaṃ vakṣye yaśaḥkīrtijayapradaṃ |
msItem.colophon: F. 548v [f. 4v in original foliation] iti śrī nārataṃ yataṃ treśrīlakṣmaṇākavacaṃ saṁpūrṇam ||

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 165, p. 21

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Hanumatkavaca.

msItem.title: Hanumatkavaca
msItem.rubric: F. 552r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ śrī rāmāya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 552r [f. 1r in original foliation]: oṃ asyaī paṃcasmukhīhanumānakavacastotramaṃtrasya ||
msItem.colophon: F. 558r [f. 7r in original foliation]: iti śrīsudarśana saṃhitāyāṃ sīsanaraṇaṃ maṃca sukhī hanumānavatvacaṃ saṃpūrṇam ||
msItem.finalRubric: F. 559r saṃvat 1879 bhāśruti tṛtīyasyāṃ ravau likhitaṃ kaśmīramadhye hāthapaṃḍita bhābhūrāmakī paṭhanārthī vaiṣṇavakausalyā-dāsavidyārthī śubham ||

decoDesc.decoNote: F. 550v: Miniature depicting Hanumān with five heads (bird, lion, monkey, horse, and rhinoceros) and ten arms holding various atributes. Framed by a gold floral border on blue and red background.
F. 552r [f. 1r in original foliation]: A border with pink and green floral motifs on gold background, framed in gold and red line.

listBibl.bibl: Keith, Appendix to Vol. I, no. 164, p. 21
